European Energy Commissioner G端nther Oettinger met Russian Energy Minister Aleksandr Novak on Monday in Berlin to discuss issues relating to security of gas supply and transit from Russia via Ukraine to the EU .
It was a constructive meeting that helped to prepare the ground for the second trilateral meeting between the EU , Russia and Ukraine , the European Commission said in a press release .

The amount of the unpaid bills for gas delivered by Russia to Ukraine is undisputed until the end of March .
An issue that still needs to be solved is the price for gas delivered in April and May and the price that should be applicable as from June .
Oettinger met Ukrainian Energy Minister Yuriy Prodan on 13 May and he will also be in contact with him in the next days ahead of the trilateral meeting , the Commission said .
